AddAINode.title: AddAINode
AddAINode.summary: Adds AI nodes to the cluster.

AllocateInstancePublicConnection.title: AllocateInstancePublicConnection
AllocateInstancePublicConnection.summary: Allocates a public endpoint for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

BindDBResourceGroupWithRole.title: BindDBResourceGroupWithRole
BindDBResourceGroupWithRole.summary: Binds a resource group to a database role.

CancelUploadDocumentJob.title: CancelUploadDocumentJob
CancelUploadDocumentJob.summary: Cancels an asynchronous document upload job based on the job ID.

CancelUpsertCollectionDataJob.title: CancelUpsertCollectionDataJob
CancelUpsertCollectionDataJob.summary: Cancels an asynchronous vector data upload job by using a job ID.

ChatWithKnowledgeBase.title: ChatWithKnowledgeBase
ChatWithKnowledgeBase.summary: Provides intelligent question-and-answer services by combining a knowledge base with a large language model.

ChatWithKnowledgeBaseStream.title: ChatWithKnowledgeBaseStream
ChatWithKnowledgeBaseStream.summary: Provides intelligent question-and-answer services by combining a knowledge base with a large language model. A streaming API, which is called by using the SSE or the Java asynchronous SDK.

CheckHadoopDataSource.title: CheckHadoopDataSource
CheckHadoopDataSource.summary: Checks the configurations of a Hadoop data source.

CheckHadoopNetConnection.title: CheckHadoopNetConnection
CheckHadoopNetConnection.summary: Checks the network connectivity of a Hadoop external data source.

CheckJDBCSourceNetConnection.title: CheckJDBCSourceNetConnection
CheckJDBCSourceNetConnection.summary: Check the network connectivity of the JDBC connection string

CheckServiceLinkedRole.title: CheckServiceLinkedRole
CheckServiceLinkedRole.summary: Checks whether a service-linked role is created.

CloneDBInstance.title: CloneDBInstance
CloneDBInstance.summary: Restores data to a new AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

CreateAccount.title: CreateAccount
CreateAccount.summary: Creates an initial account for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

CreateDBInstancePlan.title: CreateDBInstancePlan
CreateDBInstancePlan.summary: Creates a plan for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

CreateIndex.title: CreateIndex
CreateIndex.summary: Creates an index. Note: 1. Only scalar indexes are supported. 2. The table is write-locked during index creation. 3. When creating an index on a table with a large volume of data, the process consumes significant CPU and I/O resources of the instance. If this impacts instance availability, call CancelCreateIndexJob to cancel the index creation.

CreateSampleData.title: CreateSampleData
CreateSampleData.summary: Creates a sample dataset for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

CreateSecret.title: CreateSecret
CreateSecret.summary: Creates an access credential for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance by using the name and password of a database account.

DeleteBackup.title: DeleteBackup
DeleteBackup.summary: Deletes a backup set. You can call this operation to delete only physical backup sets that are manually backed up.

DeleteDBInstance.title: DeleteDBInstance
DeleteDBInstance.summary: Releases a pay-as-you-go AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DeleteDBInstanceIPArray.title: DeleteDBInstanceIPArray
DeleteDBInstanceIPArray.summary: Deletes an IP whitelist group from an instance.

DeleteDBInstancePlan.title: DeleteDBInstancePlan
DeleteDBInstancePlan.summary: Deletes a plan from an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DeleteDatabase.title: DeleteDatabase
DeleteDatabase.summary: Deletes a database from an instance.

DeleteHadoopDataSource.title: DeleteHadoopDataSource
DeleteHadoopDataSource.summary: Deletes a Hadoop external data source.

DeleteRemoteADBDataSource.title: DeleteRemoteADBDataSource
DeleteRemoteADBDataSource.summary: Deletes a remote AnalyticDB data source.

DeleteSecret.title: DeleteSecret
DeleteSecret.summary: Deletes the access credentials of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DeleteStreamingDataService.title: DeleteStreamingDataService
DeleteStreamingDataService.summary: Deletes the configurations of an external data source.

DeleteStreamingJob.title: DeleteStreamingJob
DeleteStreamingJob.summary: Deletes a real-time data synchronization job.

DescribeAccounts.title: DescribeAccounts
DescribeAccounts.summary: Queries the information about database accounts for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeAvailableResources.title: DescribeAvailableResources
DescribeAvailableResources.summary: Queries the information about available resources of AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL.

DescribeBackupJob.title: DescribeBackupJob
DescribeBackupJob.summary: Queries the information about a backup job.

DescribeBackupPolicy.title: DescribeBackupPolicy
DescribeBackupPolicy.summary: Queries the backup policy of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeCollection.title: DescribeCollection
DescribeCollection.summary: Queries the information about a vector collection.

DescribeCreateIndexJob.title: DescribeCreateIndexJob
DescribeCreateIndexJob.summary: Queries the information about an index creation job.

DescribeDBClusterNode.title: DescribeDBClusterNode
DescribeDBClusterNode.summary: Queries a list of nodes in an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBClusterPerformance.title: DescribeDBClusterPerformance
DescribeDBClusterPerformance.summary: Queries the information about performance metrics of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance within a time range.

DescribeDBInstanceAttribute.title: DescribeDBInstanceAttribute
DescribeDBInstanceAttribute.summary: Query detailed information about the instance.

DescribeDBInstanceDataBloat.title: DescribeDBInstanceDataBloat
DescribeDBInstanceDataBloat.summary: Queries the information about data bloat for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBInstanceDataSkew.title: DescribeDBInstanceDataSkew
DescribeDBInstanceDataSkew.summary: Queries the information about data skew for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBInstanceDiagnosisSummary.title: DescribeDBInstanceDiagnosisSummary
DescribeDBInstanceDiagnosisSummary.summary: Queries the information about nodes in an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBInstanceErrorLog.title: DescribeDBInstanceErrorLog
DescribeDBInstanceErrorLog.summary: Queries the error logs of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBInstanceIPArrayList.title: DescribeDBInstanceIPArrayList
DescribeDBInstanceIPArrayList.summary: Queries the whitelists of IP addresses that are allowed to access an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBInstanceIndexUsage.title: DescribeDBInstanceIndexUsage
DescribeDBInstanceIndexUsage.summary: Queries the index usage of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBInstanceNetInfo.title: DescribeDBInstanceNetInfo
DescribeDBInstanceNetInfo.summary: Queries the connection information of an instance.

DescribeDBInstancePerformance.title: DescribeDBInstancePerformance
DescribeDBInstancePerformance.summary: Queries the information about performance metrics of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance within a time range.

DescribeDBInstancePlans.title: DescribeDBInstancePlans
DescribeDBInstancePlans.summary: Queries the information about plans for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBInstanceSSL.title: DescribeDBInstanceSSL
DescribeDBInstanceSSL.summary: Queries the SSL information about an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBInstanceSupportMaxPerformance.title: DescribeDBInstanceSupportMaxPerformance
DescribeDBInstanceSupportMaxPerformance.summary: Queries the maximum performance of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBInstances.title: DescribeDBInstances
DescribeDBInstances.summary: Queries a list of AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances.

DescribeDBResourceGroup.title: DescribeDBResourceGroup
DescribeDBResourceGroup.summary: Queries the information about resource groups.

DescribeDBResourceManagementMode.title: DescribeDBResourceManagementMode
DescribeDBResourceManagementMode.summary: Queries the resource management mode of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDBVersionInfos.title: DescribeDBVersionInfos
DescribeDBVersionInfos.summary: Queries the information about minor versions of AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances.

DescribeDataBackups.title: DescribeDataBackups
DescribeDataBackups.summary: Queries a list of backup sets of full backup or point-in-time backup for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDataReDistributeInfo.title: DescribeDataReDistributeInfo
DescribeDataReDistributeInfo.summary: Queries the data redistribution information about an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL V6.0 instance in elastic storage mode.

DescribeDataShareInstances.title: DescribeDataShareInstances
DescribeDataShareInstances.summary: Queries the status of data sharing for AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances.

DescribeDataSharePerformance.title: DescribeDataSharePerformance
DescribeDataSharePerformance.summary: Queries the information about data sharing performance metrics.

DescribeDatabase.title: DescribeDatabase
DescribeDatabase.summary: Describes the basic information about an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL database.

DescribeDiagnosisDimensions.title: DescribeDiagnosisDimensions
DescribeDiagnosisDimensions.summary: Queries all databases and database accounts of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDiagnosisMonitorPerformance.title: DescribeDiagnosisMonitorPerformance
DescribeDiagnosisMonitorPerformance.summary: Queries the details of query execution on an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDiagnosisRecords.title: DescribeDiagnosisRecords
DescribeDiagnosisRecords.summary: Queries the information about SQL queries for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDiagnosisSQLInfo.title: DescribeDiagnosisSQLInfo
DescribeDiagnosisSQLInfo.summary: Queries the information about a query for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDocument.title: DescribeDocument
DescribeDocument.summary: Queries the information about a document.

DescribeDownloadRecords.title: DescribeDownloadRecords
DescribeDownloadRecords.summary: Queries the download records of query diagnostic information for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeDownloadSQLLogs.title: DescribeDownloadSQLLogs
DescribeDownloadSQLLogs.summary: Queries the last five download records of slow query logs for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeExternalDataService.title: DescribeExternalDataService
DescribeExternalDataService.summary: Queries the information about an external data service.

DescribeHadoopClustersInSameNet.title: DescribeHadoopClustersInSameNet
DescribeHadoopClustersInSameNet.summary: Queries a list of E-MapReduce (EMR) clusters in a virtual private cloud (VPC).

DescribeHadoopConfigs.title: DescribeHadoopConfigs
DescribeHadoopConfigs.summary: Queries the configuration information about a Hadoop cluster.

DescribeHadoopDataSource.title: DescribeHadoopDataSource
DescribeHadoopDataSource.summary: Obtains the configurations of a Hadoop data source.

DescribeHealthStatus.title: DescribeHealthStatus
DescribeHealthStatus.summary: Queries the health status of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance and its nodes.

DescribeIMVInfos.title: DescribeIMVInfos
DescribeIMVInfos.summary: Queries the information about real-time materialized views of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeIndex.title: DescribeIndex
DescribeIndex.summary: Retrieves the information about an index.

DescribeJDBCDataSource.title: DescribeJDBCDataSource
DescribeJDBCDataSource.summary: Queries the configurations of a Java Database Connectivity (JDBC) data source.

DescribeLogBackups.title: DescribeLogBackups
DescribeLogBackups.summary: Queries a list of log backups.

DescribeModelService.title: DescribeModelService
DescribeModelService.summary: Queries the information about a model service.

DescribeModifyParameterLog.title: DescribeModifyParameterLog
DescribeModifyParameterLog.summary: Queries the parameter modification logs of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeNamespace.title: DescribeNamespace
DescribeNamespace.summary: Queries the information about a namespace.

DescribeParameters.title: DescribeParameters
DescribeParameters.summary: Queries the information about configuration parameters for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribePrivateRAGService.title: DescribePrivateRAGService
DescribePrivateRAGService.summary: Obtains the details of a private RAG service.

DescribeRebalanceStatus.title: DescribeRebalanceStatus
DescribeRebalanceStatus.summary: Queries the rebalance status of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries a list of regions and zones where AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL is available.

DescribeSQLLogCount.title: DescribeSQLLogCount
DescribeSQLLogCount.summary: Queries the number of audit logs for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeSQLLogs.title: DescribeSQLLogs
DescribeSQLLogs.summary: Queries the SQL execution logs of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeSQLLogsV2.title: DescribeSQLLogsV2
DescribeSQLLogsV2.summary: Queries SQL logs within a specific time range.

DescribeSampleData.title: DescribeSampleData
DescribeSampleData.summary: Queries whether a sample dataset is loaded to an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeStreamingDataSource.title: Query Real-time Data Source
DescribeStreamingDataSource.summary: Get external data source configuration information

DescribeStreamingJob.title: DescribeStreamingJob
DescribeStreamingJob.summary: Queries a real-time data synchronization job.

DescribeSupportFeatures.title: DescribeSupportFeatures
DescribeSupportFeatures.summary: Queries the features that are supported by an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeTable.title: DescribeTable
DescribeTable.summary: Queries the information about a table.

DescribeTags.title: DescribeTags
DescribeTags.summary: Queries a list of tags for AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances.

DescribeUserEncryptionKeyList.title: DescribeUserEncryptionKeyList
DescribeUserEncryptionKeyList.summary: Queries a list of Key Management Service (KMS) keys.

DescribeWaitingSQLInfo.title: DescribeWaitingSQLInfo
DescribeWaitingSQLInfo.summary: Queries the information about a lock-waiting query for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeWaitingSQLRecords.title: DescribeWaitingSQLRecords
DescribeWaitingSQLRecords.summary: Queries the lock diagnostic records of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DescribeZonesPrivateRAGService.title: DescribeZonesPrivateRAGService
DescribeZonesPrivateRAGService.summary: Obtains the deployable zone of the private RAG service.

DisableDBResourceGroup.title: DisableDBResourceGroup
DisableDBResourceGroup.summary: Disables resource group management for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL V6.0 instance in elastic storage mode. After you disable resource group management, the resource management method of the instance switches from resource group management to resource queue management.

DownloadDiagnosisRecords.title: DownloadDiagnosisRecords
DownloadDiagnosisRecords.summary: Downloads the query diagnostic information of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

DownloadSQLLogsRecords.title: DownloadSQLLogsRecords
DownloadSQLLogsRecords.summary: Download the slow query logs of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

EnableCollectionGraphRAG.title: EnableCollectionGraphRAG
EnableCollectionGraphRAG.summary: Enables knowledge graph construction for the knowledge base.

EnableDBResourceGroup.title: EnableDBResourceGroup
EnableDBResourceGroup.summary: Enables resource group management for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL V6.0 instance in elastic storage mode. After resource group management is enabled, the resource management mode of the instance is changed from resource queue to resource group.

GetAccount.title: GetAccount
GetAccount.summary: Queries the information about a database account.

GetGraphRAGJob.title: GetGraphRAGJob
GetGraphRAGJob.summary: Retrieves a task to build a knowledge graph.

GetSecretValue.title: GetSecretValue
GetSecretValue.summary: Queries the information about an access credential.

GetSupabaseProject.title: GetSupabaseProject
GetSupabaseProject.summary: Retrieves the detailed configuration and status information for a specific Supabase instance.

GetSupabaseProjectApiKeys.title: GetSupabaseProjectApiKeys
GetSupabaseProjectApiKeys.summary: Queries a list of API keys for a Supabase project.

GetSupabaseProjectDashboardAccount.title: GetSupabaseProjectDashboardAccount
GetSupabaseProjectDashboardAccount.summary: Retrieves the username and password for the dashboard of a specific Supabase project.

GetUploadDocumentJob.title: GetUploadDocumentJob
GetUploadDocumentJob.summary: Queries the progress and result of an asynchronous document upload job based on the job ID.

GetUpsertCollectionDataJob.title: GetUpsertCollectionDataJob
GetUpsertCollectionDataJob.summary: Queries the progress and result of an asynchronous vector data upload job by using a job ID.

GrantCollection.title: GrantCollection
GrantCollection.summary: Grants vector collection permissions to a namespace.

ListAINodePools.title: ListAINodePools
ListAINodePools.summary: Queries a list of AI nodes.

ListBackupJobs.title: ListBackupJobs
ListBackupJobs.summary: Queries a list of backup jobs.

ListCollections.title: ListCollections
ListCollections.summary: Queries a list of vector collections.

ListDatabaseExtensions.title: ListDatabaseExtensions
ListDatabaseExtensions.summary: List all extensions installed in the instance.

ListDocumentCollections.title: ListDocumentCollections
ListDocumentCollections.summary: Queries a list of document collections.

ListDocuments.title: ListDocuments
ListDocuments.summary: Queries a list of documents in a collection.

ListExternalDataServices.title: ListExternalDataServices
ListExternalDataServices.summary: Queries a list of external data services.

ListExternalDataSources.title: ListExternalDataSources
ListExternalDataSources.summary: Queries a list of data sources.

ListInstanceDatabases.title: ListInstanceDatabases
ListInstanceDatabases.summary: List all databases in an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ListSecrets.title: ListSecrets
ListSecrets.summary: Queries a list of access credentials.

ListStreamingDataSources.title: ListStreamingDataSources
ListStreamingDataSources.summary: Queries a list of real-time service data sources.

ListSupabaseProjects.title: ListSupabaseProjects
ListSupabaseProjects.summary: Retrieves a paginated list of Supabase instances in your account. You can filter the list by region.

ListSupportModels.title: ListSupportModels
ListSupportModels.summary: Get the list of supported models

ListTables.title: ListTables
ListTables.summary: Queries a list of tables in a database.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries a list of AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances that have specific tags added.

ModifyAccountDescription.title: ModifyAccountDescription
ModifyAccountDescription.summary: Modifies the description of a database account for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyBackupPolicy.title: ModifyBackupPolicy
ModifyBackupPolicy.summary: Configures the backup policy of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyDBInstanceConfig.title: ModifyDBInstanceConfig
ModifyDBInstanceConfig.summary: Changes the threshold of computing resources and the wait period of idle resources for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance in Serverless automatic scheduling mode.

ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString.title: ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString
ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString.summary: Changes the endpoint of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyDBInstanceDeploymentMode.title: ModifyDBInstanceDeploymentMode
ModifyDBInstanceDeploymentMode.summary: Changes the development mode of an instance.

ModifyDBInstanceDescription.title: ModifyDBInstanceDescription
ModifyDBInstanceDescription.summary: Changes the description of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyDBInstanceMaintainTime.title: ModifyDBInstanceMaintainTime
ModifyDBInstanceMaintainTime.summary: Modifies the maintenance window of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyDBInstanceNetworkType.title: ModifyDBInstanceNetworkType
ModifyDBInstanceNetworkType.summary: Changes the network type of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyDBInstancePayType.title: ModifyDBInstancePayType
ModifyDBInstancePayType.summary: Switches between billing methods for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyDBInstanceResourceGroup.title: ModifyDBInstanceResourceGroup
ModifyDBInstanceResourceGroup.summary: Moves an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance to a resource group.

ModifyDBInstanceSSL.title: ModifyDBInstanceSSL
ModifyDBInstanceSSL.summary: Enables, disables, or updates SSL encryption for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyDBResourceGroup.title: ModifyDBResourceGroup
ModifyDBResourceGroup.summary: Modifies the configurations of a resource group.

ModifyHadoopDataSource.title: ModifyHadoopDataSource
ModifyHadoopDataSource.summary: Modifies the configurations of a Hadoop data source.

ModifyJDBCDataSource.title: ModifyJDBCDataSource
ModifyJDBCDataSource.summary: Modifies the configurations of a Java Database Connectivity (JDBC) data source.

ModifyMasterSpec.title: ModifyMasterSpec
ModifyMasterSpec.summary: Changes the specifications of coordinator node resources for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyParameters.title: ModifyParameters
ModifyParameters.summary: Modifies the configuration parameters of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyRemoteADBDataSource.title: ModifyRemoteADBDataSource
ModifyRemoteADBDataSource.summary: Modifies a remote AnalyticDB data source.

ModifySQLCollectorPolicy.title: ModifySQLCollectorPolicy
ModifySQLCollectorPolicy.summary: Enables or disables the SQL Explorer feature for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifySecurityIps.title: ModifySecurityIps
ModifySecurityIps.summary: Modifies the IP address whitelist of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ModifyStreamingDataService.title: ModifyStreamingDataService
ModifyStreamingDataService.summary: Modifies the configurations of an external data source.

ModifyStreamingDataSource.title: ModifyStreamingDataSource
ModifyStreamingDataSource.summary: Modifies a real-time service data source.

ModifySupabaseProjectSecurityIps.title: ModifySupabaseProjectSecurityIps
ModifySupabaseProjectSecurityIps.summary: Sets or replaces the IP address whitelist for a specified Supabase project.

ModifyVectorConfiguration.title: ModifyVectorConfiguration
ModifyVectorConfiguration.summary: Modifies the vector search engine optimization configuration of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

PauseInstance.title: PauseInstance
PauseInstance.summary: Pauses an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

QueryContent.title: QueryContent
QueryContent.summary: Retrieves vector data and metadata from a document collection by using natural statements.

QueryKnowledgeBasesContent.title: QueryKnowledgeBasesContent
QueryKnowledgeBasesContent.summary: Retrieves vectors and metadata from multiple specified document collections using natural language queries, then merge and return the results from all retrieval paths.

RebalanceDBInstance.title: RebalanceDBInstance
RebalanceDBInstance.summary: Rebalances an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ReleaseInstancePublicConnection.title: ReleaseInstancePublicConnection
ReleaseInstancePublicConnection.summary: Releases the public endpoint of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

Rerank.title: Rerank
Rerank.summary: The Rerank operation can resolve the issue of inaccurate ranking of vector and full-text search results. It re-scores and reranks the retrieved data through semantic understanding to significantly improve the relevance and accuracy of the results. AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL allows you to rerank search results by using Rerank models, but does not provide models.

ResetAccountPassword.title: ResetAccountPassword
ResetAccountPassword.summary: Resets the password of a database account for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ResetSupabaseProjectPassword.title: ResetSupabaseProjectPassword
ResetSupabaseProjectPassword.summary: Reset the password of a Supabase database

RestartDBInstance.title: RestartDBInstance
RestartDBInstance.summary: Restarts an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

ResumeInstance.title: ResumeInstance
ResumeInstance.summary: Resumes an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

SetDBInstancePlanStatus.title: SetDBInstancePlanStatus
SetDBInstancePlanStatus.summary: Enables or disables a plan for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

SetDataShareInstance.title: SetDataShareInstance
SetDataShareInstance.summary: Enables or disables data sharing for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

SwitchDBInstanceNetType.title: SwitchDBInstanceNetType
SwitchDBInstanceNetType.summary: Switches between the internal and public endpoints of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances.

TextEmbedding.title: TextEmbedding
TextEmbedding.summary: Generates text embeddings using an embedding model.

UnbindDBResourceGroupWithRole.title: UnbindDBResourceGroupWithRole
UnbindDBResourceGroupWithRole.summary: Unbinds database roles from a resource group.

UnloadSampleData.title: UnloadSampleData
UnloadSampleData.summary: Releases the sample dataset from an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances. If the tags that you remove are not added to other instances, the tags are automatically deleted.

UpdateDBInstancePlan.title: UpdateDBInstancePlan
UpdateDBInstancePlan.summary: Modifies a plan for an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

UpgradeDBInstance.title: UpgradeDBInstance
UpgradeDBInstance.summary: Changes the configurations of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

UpgradeDBVersion.title: UpgradeDBVersion
UpgradeDBVersion.summary: Upgrades the minor version of an AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instance.

UpsertChunks.title: UpsertChunks
UpsertChunks.summary: Splits a document into chunks and uploads the vectorized chunks to a document collection.

UpsertCollectionData.title: UpsertCollectionData
UpsertCollectionData.summary: Uploads vector data to a vector collection.

UpsertCollectionDataAsync.title: UpsertCollectionDataAsync
UpsertCollectionDataAsync.summary: Uploads vector data in an asynchronous manner by using an on-premises file or a password-free Internet-accessible file URL. The vector data can be up to 200 MB in size.
